name: ORB - Carpet Bomb [shifter's esc shader]
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=2
PSVERSION_WARP=2
PSVERSION_COMP=0
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=4.500
fDecay=0.980
fVideoEchoZoom=1.488
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000
nVideoEchoOrientation=0
nWaveMode=0

fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950

fWarpScale=1.000

rot=6.20000
cx=0.500
cy=0.500
dx=0.00000
dy=0.00000

sx=1.00000
sy=1.00000

wave_g=0.000
wave_b=0.000
wave_x=0.000
wave_y=0.000

ob_g=0.000
ob_b=0.000

ib_size=0.010
ib_r=0.250
ib_g=0.250
ib_b=0.250

nMotionVectorsY=9.000

b1n=0.000
b2n=0.000
b3n=0.000

b2x=1.000
b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=1
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_0_bUseDots=1
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=0

wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_per_frame1=basstime = basstime + bass_att*0.02;
wave_0_per_frame2=t1 = basstime;
wave_0_per_point1=val = sample*6*10;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=dx = pow(cos(sample),2);
wave_0_per_point4=dy = sin(sample);
wave_0_per_point5=dz = log(sin(sample))*5*sin(q1);
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=time_vol = time_vol + (bass+mid)*0.1;
wave_0_per_point8=
wave_0_per_point9=x = dx/dz*0.5 + 0.5 + sin(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_0_per_point10=y = dy/dz*0.5 +  0.5 + cos(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2.55);
wave_0_per_point13=r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.66);
wave_0_per_point14=b = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2);
wavecode_1_enabled=1
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_1_bUseDots=1
wavecode_1_bDrawThick=0

wavecode_1_smoothing=0.50000

wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=1.000
wave_1_per_frame1=basstime = basstime + bass_att*0.02;
wave_1_per_frame2=t1 = basstime;
wave_1_per_point1=val = sample*6*10;
wave_1_per_point2=
wave_1_per_point3=dx = pow(cos(sample),2);
wave_1_per_point4=dy = sin(sample);
wave_1_per_point5=dz = log(sin(sample))*5*sin(q1);
wave_1_per_point6=
wave_1_per_point7=time_vol = time_vol + (bass+mid)*0.1;
wave_1_per_point8=
wave_1_per_point9=x = dx/dz*0.5 + 0.5 + sin(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_1_per_point10=y = dy/dz*0.5 +  0.5 + cos(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_1_per_point11=
wave_1_per_point12=x = -x + 1;
wave_1_per_point13=
wave_1_per_point14=
wave_1_per_point15=g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2.55);
wave_1_per_point16=r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.66);
wave_1_per_point17=b = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2);

wave_2_per_frame2=t1 = basstime;
wave_2_per_point1=val = sample*6*10;

wave_2_per_point3=dx = pow(cos(sample),2);
wave_2_per_point4=dy = sin(sample);
wave_2_per_point5=dz = log(sin(sample))*5*sin(q1);
wave_2_per_point6=
wave_2_per_point7=time_vol = time_vol + (bass+mid)*0.1;
wave_2_per_point8=
wave_2_per_point9=x = dx/dz*0.5 + 0.5 + sin(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_2_per_point10=y = dy/dz*0.5 +  0.5 + cos(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_2_per_point11=
wave_2_per_point12=x = -x + 1;
wave_2_per_point13=y = -y + 1;;
wave_2_per_point14=
wave_2_per_point15=g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2.55);
wave_2_per_point16=r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.66);
wave_2_per_point17=b = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2);
wavecode_3_enabled=1

wave_3_per_frame2=t1 = basstime;
wave_3_per_point1=val = sample*6*10;
wave_3_per_point2=
wave_3_per_point3=dx = pow(cos(sample),2);
wave_3_per_point4=dy = sin(sample);
wave_3_per_point5=dz = log(sin(sample))*5*sin(q1);
wave_3_per_point6=
wave_3_per_point7=time_vol = time_vol + (bass+mid)*0.1;
wave_3_per_point8=
wave_3_per_point9=x = dx/dz*0.5 + 0.5 + sin(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_3_per_point10=y = dy/dz*0.5 +  0.5 + cos(time_vol)*0.1;
wave_3_per_point11=
wave_3_per_point12=y = -y +1;
wave_3_per_point13=
wave_3_per_point14=g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2.55);
wave_3_per_point15=r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.66);
wave_3_per_point16=b = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*2);
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=4

shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000

shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000

shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=marker = marker + equal(bass_clip,2)*rand(100)*0.1;
per_frame_3=q1 = marker;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=monitor  = marker;
per_pixel_1=zoom = 1.05;
per_pixel_2=rot = 5;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 pixelsize = texsize.zw;
warp_4=`float2 uvm = uv_orig;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`float4 noiseVal = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, frac(noise_uv*8));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`ret.xyz = saturate(tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uvm).xyz*float3(1,1,.97) - float3(.0,.0,.001));
warp_10=`
warp_11=`
warp_12=`float3 rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.xy-.5)*6*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_13=`if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_14=`ret.xy = rsamp.xy;ret.z = rsamp.z;}
warp_15=`
warp_16=`//rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.zw-.5)*2*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_17=`//if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_18=`//ret.xy = rsamp.xy;ret.z = rsamp.z;}
warp_19=`
warp_20=`
warp_21=`ret.xy *= pow(ret.z,.01);
warp_22=`
warp_23=`
warp_24=`}
